tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE social_media_engagement_metrics (
    post_id INT,
    likes INT,
    comments INT,
    shares INT,
    engagement_rate FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_content TEXT,
    likes INT,
    comments INT,
    shares INT
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username varchar(255),
    followers INT,
    following INT,
    join_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE SocialMediaPosts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_content TEXT,
    likes INT,
    comments INT,
    shares INT
);

CREATE TABLE AudienceEngagement (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    comment TEXT,
    likes INT,
    shares INT
);

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE posts (
  post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  post_content TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE comments (
  comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  post_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  comment_text TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE likes (
  like_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  post_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  date_joined DATE
)

CREATE TABLE posts (
  post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
  post_content TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE likes (
  like_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
  post_id INT REFERENCES posts(post_id),
  like_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE comments (
  comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
  post_id INT REFERENCES posts(post_id),
  comment_content TEXT,
  comment_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE engagements (
  engagement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
  post_id INT REFERENCES posts(post_id),
  like_id INT REFERENCES likes(like_id),
  comment_id INT REFERENCES comments(comment_id),
  engagement_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
